website_summaries.verdict: The Olympus Stylus SH-2 is a stylish compact camera with a 24x zoom. It's a solid performer when shooting Raw, but its JPG output is disappointing.
pros: Photo Story and Art Filter modes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality in all conditions
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Classy, solidly built, compact, and takes great photos. Low light capabilities unmatched in a small camera. No flash required indoors even with low light. Even night photos possible. Bought one for trip to Turkey. Tour guide remarked it was really nice and he had seen many small cameras! Gave him mine and bought a second one. Just as perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Fine camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this camera overall. The telephoto lens with image stabilization takes amazing shots at a distance. The low light capabilities are better than any camera I've owned. Transferring photos with wifi is a snap. I generally like the ergonomics and operations of the camera. I might change a few things but no device is perfect. I don't like how the GPS works. A bit clunky and only saves the area where you were when you transferred the photos to your phone. Maybe I'm missing something. I'm also still debating the need for this "travel camera" which while good isn't an SLR or mirror less but is bigger than my smartphone camera.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It takes great photos, but things turn yellow in low lights. Also, right after I bought it, they discontinued making it. I tried several cameras before I settled on this one and it had the most pros to offer. It has great zoom and auto focus, which makes taking great, professional looking, photos easier.
customer_reviews.author: kzw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great compact camera.Limited manual controls but overall excellent. Fantastic image stabilizer for HD video.
customer_reviews.author: bobfromdublin

customer_reviews.title: Olympus SH-2 is a must own
customer_reviews.text: This is my everyday camera. Love the art filters. Easy Manual mode. The ease of transfering to a phone or tablet is awesome. I'm hooked on Olympus products now.
customer_reviews.author: DMac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this camera! It's compact, easy to use and produces great pictures. Olympus does it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Gossage

customer_reviews.title: Great little pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera and amazing picture quality. Takes much better quality pictures than my phone and almost as compact. Wifi transfers of photos is super easy to use and a nice little feature while traveling. I get comments on the retro look also.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love Olympus products and have owned 3 cameras
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to finally purchase this, but it was a step down from what I had. I love Olympus products and have owned 3 cameras, point and shoot. This camera is great at taking movies, all the bells and whistles, but the buttons are very tiny. I don't have ginormous hands, but I find it difficult sometimes to find that little on/off button.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera in all respects. I have no idea why people buy anything fancier.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Weller

customer_reviews.text: This camera has so many features that compete favorably with other cameras I own.

customer_reviews.title: Know what you are buying.
customer_reviews.text: I am still trying to figure out why I bought this. It has all kinds of fancy programs that I will never use and some of my outdoor picks haven't captured the detail correctly. Personally I don't leave a camera outside all night to take star pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Panhead Mike

customer_reviews.title: ++ A sturdy and stylish camera with a good sized 24x zoom ++
customer_reviews.text: This Olympus Stylus SH-2 is a stylish compact camera with a 24x zoom. It's a solid performer when shooting Raw, but its JPG output is a tad disappointing when compared to something like this Lumix DMC found here:  PROS: Sharp lens. Raw capture support. 24x zoom range. Excellent build quality. 5-axis image stabilization. Touch-screen LCD. Photo Story and Art Filter modes. 10.4fps burst shooting. Snappy focus. 1080p60 video. Wi-Fi. CONS Waxy JPG output. Doesn't include external battery charger.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

product_meta.title: Olympus SH-2 16 MP Digital Camera with 24x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD (Black)
product_meta.description: The Olympus Stylus SH-2 offers an ultra-premium compact design that’s crammed with advanced features. Although it’s pocket and purse-friendly at a mere 1.7 inches thick, the Stylus SH-2 is loaded with cutting-edge technology, including RAW capture, full Optical 5-Axis Image Stabilization that eliminates all types of motion blur, powerful 24x wide-angle optical zoom to get up close from any distance, and FAST AF Technology for blazingly fast focusing in any light and any zoom. Advanced Movie Modes shoot in brilliant 1080/60p Full HD video, and the innovative Live Composite mode enables stunning nighttime and star trail capture. Built-in WiFi connectivity allows for remote shooting from a smart device and easy on-the-spot uploading and sharing.
feature_bullets: Nightscape Mode & Nightscape Movie Mode + Live Composite
